title: On a scale of 1-10 what is the junglers presence nowadays.
body: Question is the title, how much do you think the jungler sways games in this meta. 10 being they are the biggest game changer, 1 being never noticeable.

replies.body: 0. either you get camped by ur jungler or ignored. especially top lane. fun times.

depends on the rest of the team, outside of soloq obviously.

but team teams jungler's sway is all the strategy, ya dig? 

Teamfighting and objective pushing teams jungler is an 11/10
teams that revolve around "xxx gets fed" xxx being a player like faker, junglers are demoted to about a 6/10
soloq, jungler, like every other role is ?/10

Allied jungler? -10.
Enemy jungler? 15.  (/s)
Prob around a 7. They can really take over entire games when played perfectly (10), but that rarely happens..
In all honestly, I feel like the jungler is currently the strongest person on the team most of the time.
